operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$USER, T$NAMA, T$PASS, T$UFIN, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$USER, :T$NAMA,:T$PASS, :sysdate+(5/24), :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {2} SET T$USER = :T$USER, T$NAMA = :T$NAMA, T$PASS = :T$PASS, T$UFIN = sysdate+(5/24), T$REFCNTD = :T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU = :T$REFCNTU

operationName.name: listaRegistro_Param
insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$USER, T$FEIN, T$COME, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES(:T$USER, sysdate+(5/24), :T$COME, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: listaRegistrosMenu_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col303.t$orde orden, TRIM(col302.t$prog) programa, TRIM(col302.t$boto) boton FROM {2} col303 inner join {0}.ttccol302{1} col302 on col302.t$SESS = col303.t$SESS WHERE UPPER(TRIM(col303.t$user))= '[p1]' AND col303.t$orde != 0 ORDER BY col303.t$orde

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneClotUnitCOnv
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT IBD001.T$KLTC CLOT, IBD001.T$CUNI UNIT, IBD003.T$CONV STRQTY FROM {2} IBD001 LEFT JOIN {0}.TTCIBD003{1} IBD003 ON IBD003.T$ITEM = IBD001.T$ITEM AND IBD003.T$BASU = IBD001.T$CUNI AND IBD003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE TRIM(IBD001.T$ITEM) LIKE '[:T$ITEM]'

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneAlmacen
listaRegistro_ObtieneDescripcionUnidad
listaRegistro_ObtieneDescUnidNOLote
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$DSCA DESCRIPCION, T$CUNI UNID FROM {2} WHERE T$KLTC NOT IN 1 AND TRIM(T$ITEM) = '[:T$ITEM]'

operationName.name: invLabel_listaRegistrosOrdenMaquina_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col011.t$mcno machine, col011.t$pdno orden FROM {2} col011 WHERE col011.t$stat = '2' AND col011.t$mcno ='[p1]'

operationName.name: invLabel_listaRegistrosOrdenParam
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT RTRIM(sfc001.t$pdno) orden, TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm) item, TRIM(ibd001.t$dsca) desci, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) unidad, TRIM(sfc010.t$mcno) maquina FROM {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON sfc010.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno WHERE sfc001.t$osta in('5','7','9') AND sfc001.t$pdno='[p1]'

operationName.name: invLabelRegrind_listaRegistrosOrdenMaquina_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col011.t$mcno machine, col011.t$pdno orden FROM {2} col011 WHERE col011.t$stat != '1' AND col011.t$pdno ='[p1]'

operationName.name: invLabelRegrind_listaRegistrosOrdenParam
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT RTRIM(cst001.t$pdno) orden FROM {0}.tticst001{1} cst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON cst001.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno WHERE t$osta in('5','7','9') and cst001.t$pdno='[p1]'

operationName.name: invLabelRegrind_listaRegistrosOrdenParam
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TRIM(cst001.t$sitm) itemr, TRIM(ibd001.t$dsca) descar, cst001.t$pono POSICION, ibd001.t$cuni UNIDAD, ibd001.t$cwar ALMACEN, cst001.t$clot LOTE, TRIM(sfc010.t$mcno) MAQUINA FROM {0}.tticst001{1} cst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = cst001.t$sitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON sfc010.t$pdno = cst001.t$pdno WHERE ibd001.t$cpcl = 'RET' and cst001.t$pdno ='[p1]' ORDER BY ibd001.t$dsca

operationName.name: listaRegistrosMaquina_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT rou002.t$mcno machine FROM {2} rou002 WHERE rou002.t$mcno ='[p1]'

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} ( T$PDNO, T$MITM, T$DSCA, T$QTDL, T$CUNI, T$DATE, T$MESS, T$USER, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$PDNO, :T$MITM, :T$DSCA, :T$QTDL, :T$CUNI, sysdate+5/24, :T$MESS, :T$USER, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$PDNO, T$SQNB, T$PROC, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$MITM, T$QTDL, T$CUNI, T$LOG1, T$DATC, T$QTD1, T$PRO1, T$LOG2, T$DATU, T$QTD2, T$PRO2, T$LOCA, T$NORP, T$DLRP, T$DELE, T$LOGD, T$DATD, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$PDNO, :T$SQNB, :T$PROC, :T$LOGN, sysdate+5/24, :T$MITM, :T$QTDL, :T$CUNI, :T$LOG1, sysdate+5/24, :T$QTD1, :T$PRO1, :T$LOG2, sysdate+5/24, :T$QTD2, :T$PRO2, :T$LOCA, :T$NORP, sysdate+5/24, :T$DELE, :T$LOGD, sysdate+5/24, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro_Param
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {2} SET T$PDNO = :T$PDNO, T$SQNB = :T$SQNB, T$PROC = :T$PROC, T$LOGN = :T$LOGN, T$MITM = :T$MITM, T$QTDL = :T$QTDL, T$CUNI = :T$CUNI, T$LOG1 = :T$LOG1, T$QTD1 = :T$QTD1, T$PRO1 = :T$PRO1, T$LOG2 = :T$LOG2, T$QTD2 = :T$QTD2, T$PRO2 = :T$PRO2, T$LOCA = :T$LOCA, T$NORP = :T$NORP, T$DELE = :T$DELE, T$LOGD = :T$LOGD, T$REFCNTD = :T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU = :T$REFCNTU

operationName.name: invLabel_generaSecuenciaOrden
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(t$sqnb),INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1) + 1, LENGTH(MAX(t$sqnb)) - INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1)), '0') + 1, 3, '0') SECUENCIA, INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1) POSICION, MAX(t$sqnb) secuence FROM {2} WHERE t$pdno = '[p1]'

operationName.name: invLabel_tiempoGrabacion
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT NVL(COUNT(t$sqnb),'0') orden FROM {2} WHERE t$pdno = '[p1]' AND t$date BETWEEN ((sysdate+5/24) - ([p2]/24/60)) AND (sysdate+5/24)

operationName.name: invLabel_registroImprimir_Param
wrapValidation_listaRegistroSec_param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$PDNO ORDEN, T$SQNB SECUENCIA, T$MITM ITEM, T$QTDL PESO, T$LOGN USUARIO, T$DATE FECHA, T$PROC, T$CUNI, T$LOG1, T$DATC, T$QTD1, T$PRO1, T$LOG2, T$DATU, T$QTD2, T$PRO2, T$LOCA, T$NORP, T$DLRP, T$DELE, T$LOGD, T$DATD, T$CUNI UNIDAD, ROWID IDRECORD FROM {2} WHERE TRIM(t$sqnb) = '[p1]'

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$PDNO, T$SQNB, T$MITM, T$DSCA, T$CWAR, T$LOCA, T$QTDL, T$CUNI, T$DATE, T$MESS, T$USER, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$PDNO, :T$SQNB, :T$MITM, :T$DSCA, :T$CWAR, :T$LOCA, :T$QTDL, :T$CUNI, sysdate+(5/24), :T$MESS, :T$USER, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$PDNO, T$SQNB, T$PROC, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$MITM, T$PONO, T$QTDL, T$CUNI, T$LOG1, T$DATC, T$QTD1, T$PRO1, T$LOG2, T$DATU, T$QTD2, T$PRO2, T$LOCA, T$NORP, T$DLRP, T$DELE, T$LOGD, T$DATD, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$PDNO, :T$SQNB, :T$PROC, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24), :T$MITM, :T$PONO, :T$QTDL, :T$CUNI, :T$LOG1, sysdate+(5/24), :T$QTD1, :T$PRO1, :T$LOG2, sysdate+(5/24), :T$QTD2, :T$PRO2, :T$LOCA, :T$NORP, sysdate+(5/24), :T$DELE, :T$LOGD, sysdate+(5/24), :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: listaCantidadRegrind
listaRegistroXSQNB
ListaRegistro_ReprintRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT A.T$PDNO, A.T$PONO, A.T$MITM, A.T$QTDL, '' T$CWAR, A.T$LOGN, A.T$DATE-5/24 t$DATE, A.T$PROC, A.T$REFCNTD, A.T$REFCNTU, '' T$CLOT, B.T$MCNO, C.T$DSCA, A.T$NORP, A.T$CUNI, A.T$SQNB, A.T$DLRP-5/24 T$DLRP FROM {0}.TTICOL042{1} A INNER JOIN {0}.TTICOL011{1} B ON A.T$PDNO = B.T$PDNO INNER JOIN {0}.TTCIBD001{1} C ON A.T$MITM = C.T$ITEM WHERE A.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: ActualizaRegistro_ReprintRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.tticol042{1} SET T$NORP = '[:T$NORP]', T$DLRP = sysdate+(5/24) WHERE T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: wrapRegrind_ActualizaRegistro
listaRegistroXSQNB_ConfirmedRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT A.T$PDNO, A.T$SQNB, A.T$MITM, A.T$QTDL, A.T$CUNI, A.T$PONO, A.T$PRO1, B.T$DSCA, C.T$CWAR, A.T$DELE FROM {0}.tticol042{1} A INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} B ON TRIM(A.T$MITM) = TRIM(B.T$ITEM) INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} C ON A.T$PDNO = C.T$PDNO AND A.T$PONO = C.T$PONO WHERE TRIM(A.T$SQNB) = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: actualizaRegistro_ConfirmedRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.tticol042{1} SET T$LOG1 = '[:T$LOG1]', T$DATC = sysdate+(5/24), T$QTD1 = '[:T$QTD1]', T$PRO1 = '[:T$PRO1]' WHERE T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: listaRegistroXSQNB_LocatedRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT A.T$PDNO, A.T$SQNB, A.T$MITM, A.T$QTDL, A.T$CUNI, A.T$PONO, A.T$PRO2, B.T$DSCA, C.T$CWAR FROM {0}.tticol042{1} A INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} B ON TRIM(A.T$MITM) = TRIM(B.T$ITEM) INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} C ON A.T$PDNO = C.T$PDNO AND A.T$PONO = C.T$PONO WHERE TRIM(A.T$SQNB) = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: listaRegistroXSQNB_FindLocation
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT A.T$PDNO, SUBSTR(TRIM(A.T$SQNB),-2,2) T$SQNB, A.T$MITM, A.T$QTDL, A.T$CUNI, A.T$PONO, A.T$PRO2, B.T$DSCA, C.T$CWAR, D.T$LOCA FROM {0}.tticol042{1} A INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} B ON TRIM(A.T$MITM) = TRIM(B.T$ITEM) INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} C ON A.T$PDNO = C.T$PDNO AND A.T$PONO = C.T$PONO INNER JOIN {0}.twhwmd300{1} D ON C.T$CWAR = D.T$CWAR WHERE TRIM(A.T$SQNB) = '[:T$SQNB]' AND D.T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]'

operationName.name: actualizaRegistro_LocationRegrind
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.tticol042{1} SET T$LOG2 = '[:T$LOG2]', T$DATU = sysdate+(5/24), T$QTD2 = '[:T$QTD2]', T$PRO2 = '[:T$PRO2]', T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]' WHERE T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {0}.tticol074{1} (T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU, T$CHEC, T$COMM, T$CWTT, T$DATE, T$HREA, T$LOGN, T$MESS, T$OPNO, T$PDNO, T$PROC) VALUES (:T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$CHEC, :T$COMM, :T$CWTT, to_date(:T$DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), :T$HREA, :T$LOGN, :T$MESS, :T$OPNO, :T$PDNO, :T$PROC)

operationName.name: eliminarRegistro
actualizarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.tticol074{1} SET T$REFCNTD = :T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU = :T$REFCNTU, T$CHEC = :T$CHEC, T$COMM = :T$COMM, T$CWTT = :T$CWTT, T$DATE = to_date(:T$DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), T$HREA = :T$HREA, T$LOGN = :T$LOGN, T$MESS = :T$MESS, T$OPNO = :T$OPNO, T$PDNO = :T$PDNO, T$PROC = :T$PROC WHERE TRIM(UPPER(T$PDNO)) IN ([p1]) AND T$DATE BETWEEN to_date('[p2]', 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('[p3]', 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss')

operationName.name: ObtenerConsolidado
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT t$pdno, t$opno, t$cwtt, SUM(t$hrea) t$hrea, t$comm, t$logn, min(t$date) t$date, t$proc, t$chec, t$mess, t$refcntd, t$refcntu FROM {0}.tticol074{1} where t$logn = 'Shoplogix' AND TRIM(UPPER(T$PDNO)) IN ([p1]) AND T$DATE BETWEEN to_date('[p2]', 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi') AND to_date('[p3]', 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi') group by t$pdno, t$opno, t$cwtt, t$comm, t$logn, t$proc, t$chec, t$mess, t$refcntd, t$refcntu

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {0}.tticol075{1} (T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU, T$CHEC, T$COMM, T$CWTT, T$DATE, T$HREA, T$LOGN, T$MESS, T$OPNO, T$PDNO, T$PROC) VALUES (:T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$CHEC, :T$COMM, :T$CWTT, to_date(:T$DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), :T$HREA, :T$LOGN, :T$MESS, :T$OPNO, :T$PDNO, :T$PROC)

operationName.name: eliminarRegistro
insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$ORNO, T$PONO, T$ITEM, T$CWAR, T$QUNE, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$PROC, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU,T$CLOT) VALUES(:T$ORNO, :T$PONO, :T$ITEM, :T$CWAR, :T$QUNE, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24), :T$PROC, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$CLOT)

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro_Param
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {2} SET T$ORNO = :T$ORNO, T$PONO = :T$PONO, T$ITEM = :T$ITEM, T$CWAR = :T$CWAR, T$QUNE = ((T$QUNE) + :T$QUNE), T$LOGN = :T$LOGN, T$DATE = sysdate+(5/24), T$PROC = :T$PROC, T$REFCNTD = :T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU = :T$REFCNTU, T$CLOT = :T$CLOT

operationName.name: listaRegistroImprimir_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$ORNO, T$PONO, T$ITEM, T$QUNE, T$CWAR, T$LOGN, T$DATE-5/24 T$DATE, T$PROC, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU, T$CLOT FROM {2} WHERE T$PONO = '[p1]' AND T$ORNO = '[p2]' AND TRIM(T$ITEM) = '[p3]' AND T$CWAR = '[p4]'

operationName.name: insertarRegistro_regrindM
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$ORNO, T$PONO, T$ITEM, T$CWAR, T$QUNE, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$PROC, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU,T$CLOT) VALUES(:T$ORNO, :T$PONO, :T$ITEM, :T$CWAR, :T$QUNE, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24), :T$PROC, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$CLOT)

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
actualizarRegistro_Param
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.tticol125{1} SET T$FPDN = :T$FPDN, T$ITEM = :T$ITEM, T$QANA = :T$QANA, T$LOGN = :T$LOGN, T$DATE = :T$DATE, T$PRIN = :T$PRIN, T$CONF = :T$CONF

operationName.name: lineClearance_verificaOrdenes_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT RTRIM(cst001.t$pdno) orden FROM {0}.tticst001{1} cst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON cst001.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno WHERE sfc001.t$osta IN('5','7','9') AND cst001.t$pdno='[p1]'

operationName.name: lineCleareance_verificaItemInsert
lineClearance_listaRegistrosOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT DISTINCT ORDEN, '' ALMACEN, art.t$kltc LOTE, ARTICULO, art.t$dsca DESCRIPCION, art.t$cuni UNIDAD, CANT_EST, ACT_CANT, '' ISS_WAREH, 0 FACTOR, art.t$kltc IND_LOTE, '' ID FROM {0}.tticst001{1} rec INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} art ON rec.t$sitm = art.t$item INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd200{1} ibd200 ON art.t$item = ibd200.t$item INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc ON rec.t$pdno = sfc.t$pdno RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT rec.t$pdno ORDEN, rec.t$sitm ARTICULO, SUM(rec.t$ques) CANT_EST, sum(rec.t$qucs) ACT_CANT FROM {0}.tticst001{1} rec WHERE TRIM(rec.t$pdno)='[p1]' GROUP BY rec.t$pdno, rec.t$sitm) TB1 ON TRIM(TB1.ARTICULO) = TRIM(rec.t$sitm) WHERE sfc.t$osta in('5','7','9') AND TRIM(rec.t$pdno)='[p1]'

operationName.name: lineClearance_verificaRegistrosOrden_Param
lineClearance_verificaRegistrosOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT t$clot LOTE, t$item DESCRIPCION FROM {0}.twhltc300{1} WHERE TRIM(t$item) = '[p1]' AND TRIM(t$clot) = '[p2]' AND TRIM(t$orto) = '[p3]'

operationName.name: lineClearance_verificaLote_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT t$clot LOTE, t$clot DESCRIPCION FROM {0}.TWHINH225{1} INH225 WHERE t$oorg = 4 AND TRIM(t$orno) = '[p1]' AND TRIM(t$item) = '[p2]' GROUP BY t$clot

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$PDNO,T$PONO,T$ITEM,T$CWAR,T$CLOT,T$REQT,T$USER, T$DATE,T$PRIN,T$CONF,T$REFCNTD,T$REFCNTU,T$MESS ) VALUES (:T$PDNO,:T$PONO,:T$ITEM,:T$CWAR,:T$CLOT,:T$REQT,:T$USER, sysdate+(5/24),:T$PRIN,:T$CONF,:T$REFCNTD,:T$REFCNTU,:T$MESS)

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro_Param
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {2} SET T$PDNO = :T$PDNO, T$PONO = :T$PONO, T$ITEM = :T$ITEM, T$CWAR = :T$CWAR, T$CLOT = :T$CLOT, T$PRIN = :T$PRIN, T$CONF = :T$CONF, T$MESS = :T$MESS

operationName.name: listaRegistrosporConfirmar_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT t125.ROWID IDRECORD, T$PDNO, T$PONO pos, t125.T$ITEM articulo, T125.T$CWAR almacen, T$CLOT lot, T$REQT retQty, t125.T$USER, t125.T$PRIN, t125.T$CONF, t125.T$REFCNTD, t125.T$REFCNTU, t125.T$MESS, ART.T$DSCA DESCRIPCION, ART.T$CUNI UNIDAD FROM {0}.tticol125{1} t125 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} art ON TRIM(t125.T$ITEM) = TRIM(art.t$item) WHERE T$PDNO ='[p1]' AND T$CONF = '[p2]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT RTRIM(cst001.t$pdno) orden FROM {0}.tticst001{1} cst001, {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 WHERE cst001.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno and t$osta in('5','7') AND cst001.t$pdno='[p1]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T125.*, art.t$cuni Unidad, ART.T$DSCA DESCRIPCION, T125.rowid ID FROM {0}.tticol125{1} T125 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ART ON TRIM(T125.T$ITEM) = TRIM(ART.t$item) WHERE (T125.T$PRIN IN(1, 2)) AND T125.T$PDNO ='[p1]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosOrden_ParamLast
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT rec.rowid ID, rec.t$pdno Orden, rec.t$pono Pos, rec.t$cwar Almacen, rec.t$sitm Articulo, art.t$dsca Descripcion, art.t$cuni Unidad, TB1.Cantidad Cant, art.t$kltc Lote FROM {0}.tticst001{1} rec LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} art on rec.t$sitm = art.t$item LEFT JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc ON rec.t$pdno = sfc.t$pdno INNER JOIN (select sfc.t$pdno Orden, cst001.t$sitm Articulo, SUM(cst001.t$qucs) Cantidad from {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc inner join {0}.tticst001{1} cst001 on cst001.t$pdno = sfc.t$pdno where sfc.t$osta in('5','7') and cst001.t$qucs <> 0 and sfc.t$pdno='[p1]' group by sfc.t$pdno, cst001.t$sitm) TB1 ON TRIM(TB1.Articulo) = TRIM(rec.t$sitm) WHERE sfc.t$osta in('5','7') AND rec.t$nnts = 1 AND sfc.t$pdno='[p1]' AND rec.t$qucs > 0 ORDER BY rec.t$pono

operationName.name: listaRegistrosOrden_ParamHis
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T125.T$PDNO, T125.T$PONO, T125.T$ITEM, T125.T$CWAR, T125.T$CLOT, T125.T$REQT, T125.T$USER, TO_CHAR(((T125.T$DATE)-5/24), 'DD/MM/YYYY hh24:mi:ss') T$DATE, T125.T$PRIN, T125.T$CONF, T125.T$REFCNTD, T125.T$REFCNTU, T125.T$MESS, art.t$cuni Unidad, ART.T$DSCA DESCRIPCION, T125.ROWID ID, '125' TABLA FROM {0}.tticol125{1} T125 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ART ON TRIM(T125.T$ITEM) = TRIM(ART.t$item) WHERE T125.T$PDNO = '[p1]' UNION SELECT T125.T$PDNO, T125.T$PONO, T125.T$ITEM, T125.T$CWAR, T125.T$CLOT, T125.T$REQT, T125.T$USER, TO_CHAR(((T125.T$DATE)-5/24), 'DD/MM/YYYY hh24:mi:ss') T$DATE, T125.T$PRIN, T125.T$CONF, T125.T$REFCNTD, T125.T$REFCNTU, T125.T$MESS, art.t$cuni Unidad, ART.T$DSCA DESCRIPCION, T125.ROWID ID, '126' TABLA FROM {0}.tticol126{1} T125 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ART ON TRIM(T125.T$ITEM) = TRIM(ART.t$item) WHERE T125.T$PDNO = '[p1]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosLoteItem_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ltc100.t$clot lote FROM {0}.twhltc100{1} ltc100 WHERE TRIM(ltc100.t$item) = '[p1]' AND TRIM(ltc100.t$clot) = '[p2]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosLoteItem_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ctl.T$CLOT lote FROM {0}.twhltc300{1} ctl WHERE TRIM(ctl.t$orto) = '[p3]' AND TRIM(ctl.t$item) = '[p1]' AND TRIM(ctl.t$clot) = '[p2]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosPendConfItem_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT COUNT(1) CANT FROM {0}.tticol125{1} ctl WHERE 1 = 0 AND TRIM(ctl.t$pdno) = '[p1]' AND TRIM(ctl.t$pono) = '[p2]'

operationName.name: cantidadMaximaPorLote
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT SUM(inh225.t$astk) cantMax FROM {0}.twhinh225{1} inh225 WHERE inh225.t$oorg = 4 AND TRIM(inh225.t$orno) = '[p1]' AND inh225.t$pono = [p2] AND TRIM(inh225.t$item) = '[p3]' AND inh225.t$clot = '[p4]' AND inh225.t$rlsd = 1

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneAlmacen
insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} ( T$ORNO, T$ITEM, T$LOCA, T$CWAR, T$QDEL, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$CONF, T$CUSR, T$CDAT, T$MESS, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$ORNO, :T$ITEM, :T$LOCA, :T$CWAR, :T$QDEL, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24), :T$CONF, :T$CUSR, sysdate+(5/24), :T$MESS, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro_Param
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {2} SET T$ORNO = :T$ORNO, T$ITEM = :T$ITEM, T$LOCA = :T$LOCA, T$CWAR = :T$CWAR, T$QDEL = :T$QDEL, T$CONF = :T$CONF, T$CUSR = :T$CUSR, T$CDAT = sysdate+(5/24), T$MESS = :T$MESS, T$REFCNTD = :T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU = :T$REFCNTU

operationName.name: spareDelivery_listaRegistroItem_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT art.t$item ARTICULO, art.t$dsca DESCRIPCION, art.t$cuni UNIDAD, NVL(rec.t$qucs,0) ACT_CANT FROM {0}.tticst001{1} rec RIGHT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} art ON rec.t$sitm = art.t$item WHERE TRIM(art.t$item) = '[p1]'

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TS100.T$ITEM ARTICULO, TS100.T$LOCA UBICACION, TS100.T$CWAR BODEGA, TS100.T$QDEL CANTIDAD, DESCRIPCION, UNIDAD, TS100.ROWID ID FROM {0}.ttscol100{1} TS100 INNER JOIN (SELECT art.t$item ARTICULO, art.t$dsca DESCRIPCION, art.t$cuni UNIDAD FROM {0}.tticst001{1} rec RIGHT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} art ON rec.t$sitm = art.t$item) art ON TS100.T$ITEM = ARTICULO WHERE TRIM(TS100.t$orno) = '[p1]' AND TS100.t$conf = 2

operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$LABL, T$SQNB, T$CWAR, T$ITEM, T$CLOT, T$QTDL, T$CUNI, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$COUN, T$PROC, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU, T$ZONE) VALUES (:T$LABL, :T$SQNB, :T$CWAR, :T$ITEM, :T$CLOT, :T$QTDL, :T$CUNI, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24), :T$COUN, :T$PROC, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$ZONE)

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT sfc001.ROWID ID, RTRIM(sfc001.t$pdno) orden, TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm) item, TRIM(ibd001.t$dsca) desci, TRIM(T$CUNI) unidad, T$UNIT, ibd003.T$CONV, CASE TRIM(T$UNIT) WHEN 'UN' THEN ROUND(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) ELSE T$CONV END FACTOR FROM {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON sfc010.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm WHERE sfc001.t$pdno='[p1]' AND sfc001.t$osta < 8 AND TRIM(T$UNIT) = 'UN' ORDER BY sfc001.t$pdno

operationName.name: listarItems
operationName.stringSQL: select trim(ibd001.t$item) item, trim(ibd001.t$dsca) descripcion from {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 where trim(ibd001.t$item) = '[p1]' group by trim(ibd001.t$item), trim(ibd001.t$dsca)

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {0}.tticol132{1} (T$BCDE, T$DATE, T$TYPE, T$ITEM, T$USER, T$STAT, T$MCNO, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$BCDE, sysdate+(5/24), :T$TYPE, :T$ITEM, :T$USER, :T$STAT, :T$MCNO, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: ObtenerBox
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col132.T$BCDE, col132.T$DATE, col132.T$TYPE, col132.T$ITEM, col132.T$USER, col132.T$STAT, col132.T$MCNO, col132.T$REFCNTD, col132.T$REFCNTU FROM {0}.tticol132{1} col132 WHERE TRIM(upper(col132.t$bcde)) = '[p1]'

operationName.name: ValidarMaquina
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT rou002.t$mcno FROM {0}.ttirou002{1} rou002 WHERE TRIM(rou002.t$mcno) = '[p1]'

operationName.name: listarItemByBarCode
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TRIM(UPPER(col132.t$item)) Item, TRIM(UPPER(ibd001.t$dsca)) descripcion FROM {0}.tticol132{1} col132 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON TRIM(UPPER(ibd001.t$item)) = TRIM(UPPER(col132.t$item)) WHERE TRIM(UPPER(col132.t$bcde)) = '[p1]' AND col132.t$type = [p2] GROUP BY TRIM(UPPER(col132.t$item)), ibd001.t$dsca

operationName.name: GetData
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT DECODE(MAX(mcs050.t$ffno), NULL, 1, MAX(mcs050.t$ffno) + 1) AS OrderNumber, sysdate AdjustmentDate, col130.t$emno Employee, col130.t$cwar Warehouse, ibd001.t$item Item, [p2] AS AdjustmentQuantity, ibd001.t$cuni Unit, col130.t$cdis AdjustmentReason, 1 AS Status, ' ' AS AdjustmentBaanOrder, 10 AS AdjustmentBaanOrderLine FROM {0}.tticol130{1} col130, {0}.ttcmcs050{1} mcs050, {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 WHERE mcs050.t$nrgr = col130.t$nrgr AND trim(ibd001.t$item) = '[p1]' GROUP BY sysdate, col130.t$emno, col130.t$cwar, ibd001.t$item, ibd001.t$cuni, col130.t$cdis

operationName.name: insertarDatos
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {0}.ttdcol524{1} ( t$orno$eam, t$odat, t$emno, t$cwar, t$item, t$vstk, t$stun, t$recd, t$esta, t$orno, t$pono, t$refcntd,t$refcntu) VALUES (:t$orno$eam,sysdate+(5/24),:t$emno,:t$cwar,:t$item,:t$vstk,:t$stun,:t$recd,:t$esta,:t$orno,:t$pono,:t$refcntd,:t$refcntu)

operationName.name: actualizarContadores
operationName.stringSQL: UPDATE {0}.ttcmcs050{1} mcs050 SET mcs050.t$ffno = mcs050.t$ffno + 5 WHERE mcs050.t$nrgr IN (SELECT col130.t$nrgr FROM {0}.tticol130{1} col130 GROUP BY col130.t$nrgr)

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneConteo
listaRegistro_ObtieneSecuencia
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT NVL(MAX(T$SQNB),0) SEQ FROM {2} WHERE T$CWAR = '[:T$CWAR]' AND T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]' AND T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneSecuenciaNolote
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT NVL(MAX(T$SQNB),0) SEQ FROM {2} WHERE T$CWAR = '[:T$CWAR]' AND T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]'

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneSecuenciaLOCATION
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT NVL(MAX(T$SQNB),0) SEQ FROM {2} WHERE T$CWAR = '[:T$CWAR]' AND T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneSecuenciaNoloteLOCATION
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT NVL(MAX(T$SQNB),0) SEQ FROM {2} WHERE T$CWAR = '[:T$CWAR]' AND T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND TRIM(T$MITM) = '[:T$MITM]'

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$SQNB,T$CWAR,T$LOCA,T$PDNO,T$MITM,T$DSCA,T$QTDL,T$CUNI,T$DATE,T$MESS,T$PROC,T$COUN,T$REFCNTD,T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$SQNB,:T$CWAR,:T$LOCA,:T$PDNO,:T$MITM,:T$DSCA,:T$QTDL,:T$CUNI,sysdate+(5/24),:T$MESS,:T$PROC,:T$COUN,:T$REFCNTD,:T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: INSERT INTO {2} (T$SOUR, T$ORNO, T$PONO, T$DWMS, T$PWMS, T$CWAR, T$ITEM, T$QANA, T$CUNI, T$CLOT, T$INDT, T$PRDT, T$PROC, T$RCNO, T$RWMS, T$LOGN, T$ERRO, T$SEQN, T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU) VALUES (:T$SOUR, :T$ORNO, :T$PONO, :T$DWMS, :T$PWMS, :T$CWAR, :T$ITEM, :T$QANA, :T$CUNI, :T$CLOT, sysdate+(5/24), sysdate+(5/24), :T$PROC, :T$RCNO, :T$RWMS, :T$LOGN, :T$ERRO, :T$SEQN, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU)

operationName.name: listaRegistros_ObtieneItem
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$ITEM ID, TRIM(T$ITEM) ITEM FROM {2} WHERE T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]' AND T$CLOT = '[:T$CLOT]' GROUP BY T$ITEM

operationName.name: listaRegistro_Clot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$ITEM ITEM FROM {2} WHERE T$CLOT = '[:T$CLOT]' AND TRIM(T$ITEM) = '[:T$ITEM]'

operationName.name: listaRegistro_SiExiste
listaRegistros_ObtieneItem
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$ITEM ID, TRIM(T$ITEM) ITEM FROM {2} WHERE T$CLOT = '[:T$CLOT]' GROUP BY T$ITEM

operationName.name: listaRegistro_ObtieneAlmacenLocation
listaRegistro_ObtieneAlmacen
listaRegistro_AlmacenUbicaion
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$DSCA FROM {2} WHERE T$CWAR = '[:T$CWAR]' AND T$LOCA = '[:T$LOCA]'

operationName.name: listaRegistrosMaquinas
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 ORDER BY col003.t$mcno

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr) *(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW)))) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC(CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr)) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, 1 AS Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch * col020.t$nuti END ELSE col020.t$camo END) / 1000, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, 1 AS T$CONV, 1 AS T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, 1 AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItemsUSA
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, sfc001.t$qrdr AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC( CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END / CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, rou102.t$exin AS RunspeedExpected, rou102.t$exin AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou102{1} rou102 ON rou102.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND rou102.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItemsUSA
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr)) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, 1 AS Filter4, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, 1 AS T$CONV, 1 AS T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, 1 AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: xmlColumns
operationName.stringSQL: Name, MachineID, Filter1, ProductionQtyExpected, Filter3, Filter4, CycleFactor, RunspeedExpected, JobMaxRunRate, InvCycleFactor
